profile.name: Chaitanya Dasari
profile.title: Full Stack Data Scientist & AI Engineer
profile.passion: 5+ yrs • Generative AI • Agentic RAG • Deep Learning • MLOps • Cloud Architecture

about.professional: Full Stack Data Scientist and AI Engineer with 5+ years of experience architecting scalable Generative AI and ML systems for Microsoft and Fortune 500 clients. Expert in building end-to-end Agentic RAG pipelines and autonomous systems using GPT-4, LangGraph, and Vector Databases handling 10TB+ of enterprise data. Proven track record of bridging the gap between research and production—deploying Deep Learning models via Docker/Kubernetes and robust CI/CD pipelines to serve 100,000+ daily users. Passionate about optimizing inference latency (sub-200ms) and driving AI safety in high-stakes environments.
about.personal: When I'm not working, I spend my time traveling to new places, hiking through scenic trails, and hitting the gym 4 days a week to stay active and healthy. I'm always inspired by innovative ideas, and I enjoy researching new technologies to stay ahead in the field.
about.education: M.S. Data Analytics, Concordia University St. Paul (GPA 3.91) — B.Sc., Nizam College (GPA 8.22)

bullets: Architected Agentic RAG pipelines for Microsoft 365 Business Copilots using Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o) and Semantic Kernel, enabling reasoning over 10TB+ of enterprise data with 95% retrieval accuracy.
Optimized production inference at global scale by implementing high-performance vector indexing on Azure AI Search and Pinecone, achieving sub-200ms query latency for 50M+ documents.
Implemented robust AI Safety guardrails and CI/CD testing pipelines using Prompt Flow and Azure AI Content Safety, blocking 99% of adversarial attacks and ensuring Responsible AI alignment.
experience.tags: Keywords: Agentic RAG, GPT-4o, Semantic Kernel, Vector Search, AI Safety, Prompt Flow

bullets: Developed an Agentic NLP workflow using LangGraph on Azure ML Studio to summarize unstructured financial reports, reducing analyst time-to-insight by 50%.
Modeled complex entity relationships using Graph Theory (Neo4j) and GraphRAG, statistically reducing hallucination rates in automated summaries compared to baseline vector-only approaches.
Designed Quantitative Trading Strategies using Reinforcement Learning agents on Azure Compute, demonstrating a 15% increase in risk-adjusted returns (Sharpe Ratio).
experience.tags: Keywords: LangGraph, GraphRAG, Neo4j, Reinforcement Learning, Azure ML

bullets: Built a Student Retention System from scratch: engineered SQL pipelines in Amazon RDS, trained an XGBoost classifier (88% accuracy), and served predictions via a FastAPI endpoint on AWS EC2.
Deployed a scalable NLP pipeline using Docker containers on AWS Lambda, applying Hugging Face Transformers for real-time sentiment analysis of social media data.
experience.tags: Keywords: AWS Lambda, FastAPI, Docker, XGBoost, Hugging Face

bullets: Architected Big Data pipelines using Snowflake and PySpark on Azure Databricks to process TB-scale claims for 5M+ patients, and deployed a containerized BERT + XGBoost ensemble on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) via CI/CD.
Developed a Hybrid Fraud System combining PyTorch (LSTM) and Isolation Forest that reduced false positives by 20%, optimizing inference latency to <100ms using ONNX runtime for real-time detection.
Designed a centralized Feature Store on Databricks (Delta Lake) for financial indicators and ensured HIPAA compliance through PII masking and Azure Virtual Networks (VNet) isolation.
experience.tags: Keywords: Azure Databricks, PySpark, AKS, BERT, Feature Store, ONNX, Fraud Detection

bullets: Developed a Customer Churn Model using AWS SageMaker (XGBoost) that predicted attrition with 85% accuracy, saving $1.5M in annual revenue, and automated ETL processes using Python and AWS S3.

Transformed operational reporting by applying Time-Series Forecasting (ARIMA/Prophet) to predict network congestion for proactive bandwidth allocation, and validated strategies via A/B Testing and ANOVA analysis presented in Tableau.
experience.tags: Keywords: AWS SageMaker, Churn Prediction, Time-Series Forecasting, A/B Testing, ETL

skills.core: Python · SQL · R · Machine Learning · Generative AI · Agentic RAG · Deep Learning · MLOps · Cloud (Azure · AWS · GCP) · Vector Databases

projects.name: ChatGPT NLP Analyzer
projects.description: A sophisticated web-based NLP tool leveraging OpenAI's GPT-3.5 API for text analysis and processing.

projects.name: Upstox Secure Trading Chatbot
projects.description: A secure, modular trading chatbot leveraging Python, Streamlit, FastAPI, and Upstox API for real-time portfolio management. Highlights: LangChain agent architecture and MCP server for conversational trading and secure orchestration.
